feed.title: Dockerizalo Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dockerizalo: v1.1.0
entry.content:
v1.1.0

What's Changed

  • feat: add support for docker labels by @undernightcore in https://github.com/undernightcore/dockerizalo/pull/3

Full Changelog: https://github.com/undernightcore/dockerizalo/commits/1.1.0

How to update

Stop Dockerizalo

shell docker compose down

Pull new images

shell docker compose pull

Start Dockerizalo again

shell docker compose up -d

entry.title: New release for Dockerizalo: v1.2.0
entry.content:
v1.2.0

What's Changed

  • feat: replace dockerode build with docker cli and add app path configuracion by @undernightcore in https://github.com/undernightcore/dockerizalo/pull/4

Full Changelog: https://github.com/undernightcore/dockerizalo/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0

How to update

Stop Dockerizalo

shell docker compose down

Pull new images

shell docker compose pull

Start Dockerizalo again

shell docker compose up -d
